授業目的: The purpose of this course is to prepare students for the TOEFL Reading and Writing sections.
到達目標: Students will be able to identify the different types of question in the reading sectionStudents will be able to organize and structure their written responses to the writing section

第1回: Students will be given a homework pack that is based on the Reading and Writing section. They must have completed this pack for Class 14, when they will submit the homework.
